issues.description: State update after async operation without cleanup check
issues.suggestion: Use cleanup flag: let isMounted = true; ... if (isMounted) setState(...)
Use type guards or validate at runtime instead
Wrap in try-catch or use safe parsing utility

issues.description: Non-null assertion (!) can cause runtime errors
issues.suggestion: Use optional chaining (?.) or explicit null check instead
